2025-12-09T09:06:18.4621601Z [36;1mrm -rf deploy[0m
2025-12-09T09:06:18.4621811Z [36;1mmkdir -p deploy[0m
2025-12-09T09:06:18.4622008Z [36;1m[0m
2025-12-09T09:06:18.4622187Z [36;1m# Copia o App Next.js[0m
2025-12-09T09:06:18.4622425Z [36;1mcp -R .next/standalone/. deploy/[0m
2025-12-09T09:06:18.4622657Z [36;1m[0m
2025-12-09T09:06:18.4622921Z [36;1m# Copia estáticos (mas vamos limpar os pesados depois)[0m
2025-12-09T09:06:18.4623302Z [36;1mif [ -d public ]; then cp -R public deploy/public; fi[0m
2025-12-09T09:06:18.4623648Z [36;1mmkdir -p deploy/.next/static[0m
2025-12-09T09:06:18.4623952Z [36;1mcp -R .next/static/. deploy/.next/static[0m
2025-12-09T09:06:18.4624212Z [36;1m[0m
2025-12-09T09:06:18.4624477Z [36;1mcp staticwebapp.config.json deploy/staticwebapp.config.json[0m
2025-12-09T09:06:18.4624800Z [36;1m[0m
2025-12-09T09:06:18.4625037Z [36;1mecho "--- 3. DEPENDÊNCIAS DE PRODUÇÃO NO ARTEFATO ---"[0m
2025-12-09T09:06:18.4625448Z [36;1m# Reinstala apenas as dependências de produção usando o lockfile raiz[0m
2025-12-09T09:06:18.4625860Z [36;1m# para garantir um node_modules enxuto dentro do artefato.[0m
2025-12-09T09:06:18.4626224Z [36;1mcp package-lock.json deploy/package-lock.json[0m
2025-12-09T09:06:18.4626515Z [36;1mrm -rf deploy/node_modules[0m
2025-12-09T09:06:18.4626809Z [36;1mnpm ci --omit=dev --ignore-scripts --prefix deploy[0m
2025-12-09T09:06:18.4627083Z [36;1m[0m
2025-12-09T09:06:18.4627279Z [36;1mecho "--- 4. OTIMIZAÇÃO DO ARTEFATO ---"[0m
2025-12-09T09:06:18.4627666Z [36;1m# Mantemos os binários Debian do Prisma (compatíveis com o runner do SWA)[0m
2025-12-09T09:06:18.4628092Z [36;1m# e removemos apenas arquivos grandes ou não usados.[0m
2025-12-09T09:06:18.4628423Z [36;1mbash scripts/prune-deploy-artifact.sh deploy[0m
2025-12-09T09:06:18.4628858Z [36;1m[0m
2025-12-09T09:06:18.4629214Z [36;1m# AÇÃO EXTRA: Esvaziar pasta Public da FUNCTION[0m
2025-12-09T09:06:18.4629707Z [36;1m# (Os arquivos estáticos já foram subidos para o CDN na etapa de build padrão)[0m
2025-12-09T09:06:18.4630174Z [36;1m# A Function não precisa dos vídeos MP4/MOV, apenas o navegador precisa.[0m
2025-12-09T09:06:18.4630560Z [36;1mfind deploy/public -name "*.mp4" -delete[0m
2025-12-09T09:06:18.4630838Z [36;1mfind deploy/public -name "*.mov" -delete[0m
2025-12-09T09:06:18.4631115Z [36;1mfind deploy/public -name "*.jpg" -delete[0m
2025-12-09T09:06:18.4631396Z [36;1mfind deploy/public -name "*.png" -delete[0m
2025-12-09T09:06:18.4631637Z [36;1m[0m
2025-12-09T09:06:18.4631809Z [36;1m# Limpeza Geral[0m
